description:
- Give an example data of the IoT sport case for instance the information of football match of a team (the positions, velocities of each player with are recorded in every 20 millisecond).
- We use Python to analysis and processing data (calculate the match time, analyst the activities of each player such as time in the bench, time in the pitch, ... )
- We use Tableau to visualize data


**Recorded at** PyCon.DE 2017 Karlsruhe: https://de.pycon.org/

**Video editing**: Sebastian Neubauer & Andrei Dan

**Tools**: Blender, Avidemux & Sonic Pi
title: Sport analysis with Python
